checkbox.indeterminate_desc: The indeterminate property can help you to achieve a 'check all' effect.
checkbox.group_desc: Generate a group of checkboxes from an array.
checkbox.api.indeterminate: Indeterminate state, commonly used for 'check all' functionality.
checkbox.api.label: Label text or custom View for the checkbox.
checkbox.api.token.checkboxSize: Size of the checkbox component, affecting overall appearance.
checkbox.api.token.borderRadius: Border radius of the checkbox box.
checkbox.api.token.lineWidthBold: Line width of the checkmark symbol.
checkbox.api.token.colorPrimary: Background color of the checkbox when checked.
checkbox.api.token.colorPrimaryHover: Background color of checked checkbox on hover.
checkbox.api.token.colorBorder: Border color of checkbox in default state.
checkbox.api.token.colorBgContainer: Background color of checkbox in default state.
checkbox.api.token.colorWhite: Color of the checkmark in checked state.
checkbox.api.token.colorTextDisabled: Text and checkmark color in disabled state.
checkbox.api.token.paddingXS: Spacing between checkbox text and the box.
